column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: All southbound lanes are shut down at Exit 115 (Newtown Pike) until further notice due to a collision involving a semi just south of Exit 113 (Paris Pike).

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: The semi jackknifed and reportedly leaked a significant amount of fluids.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: No access to I-75S from Newtown Pike or N Broadway.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: NOTE:  Motorists can expect increased congestion on the inner loop of New Circle Rd between Newtown Pike and Winchester Rd.
